markAllNotificationsAsReadModal.markAllA:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the 'Mark all as read' confirmation modal
**UI Location**: Notifications list → Mark all as read button → Confirmation modal (modal heading)
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks the 'Mark all as read' button
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Mark all as read?"
markAllNotificationsAsReadModal.areYouSu:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation message for marking all notifications as read
**UI Location**: Notifications list → Mark all as read button → Confirmation modal (modal body)
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks the 'Mark all as read' button
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to mark all notifications as read?"
markAllNotificationsAsReadModal.continue:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to proceed with marking all notifications as read
**UI Location**: Notifications list → Mark all as read button → Confirmation modal (primary button)
**When Users See This**: When the 'Mark all as read' confirmation modal is open
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Continue"
markAllNotificationsAsReadModal.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to cancel marking all notifications as read
**UI Location**: Notifications list → Mark all as read button → Confirmation modal (secondary button)
**When Users See This**: When the 'Mark all as read' confirmation modal is open
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Cancel"
list.youHaveNoNotifications:
